summary: An even better looking Muiri! ( =comsetic changes only )
descriptionHtml:
An, in my opinion, even better looking version of our cute little Muiri.

To achieve the best looks for the NPC (screenshots), I highly recommend using navetsea\'s Female face retexture: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5106 
and/or Xenius Character Enhancer(XCE): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356
 
Installation:
Drop the two files into your Skyrim/Data folder, then check the .esp in NMM or in your launcher.


Credits:
Thanks to
-foretrenty (Skyrim NPC Editor)
-navetsea (Female Face Retexture)
-Xenius (Xenius Character Enhancer)
author: Nexus_666
